title: How to use 5g in China mainland? I heard google disabled it.
content:
I heard that google disabled 5g in China mainland, including all carriers. 
You know that pixel phones don't sell in China officially, so in China if you want to use a pixel phone, you have to experice a very complex and difficult period. In other words, in China, a man who use a pixel phone must be a very loyal Google fan. But why Google do this to harm their heart.
I'm a loyal Google fan. And I feel very sad. Pixel 5 support n78 and my carrier is using n78 5g, but I cannot use 5g in China. Please don't do things like this.
What I love Google most is the famous sentence: don't be evil. I hope Google can insist this.
